title: How to Make Sweet Yogurt Drink (Sweet Lassi)

steps.headline: Put all the ingredients in a blender and blend them till the mixture is frothy.
Serve over ice.
steps.description: It takes less then 5 minutes to prepare.

steps.headline: It is nutrient rich, full of health benefits and very refreshing.

text: Put all the ingredients in a blender and blend them till the mixture is frothy.  Serve over ice. It takes less then 5 minutes to prepare. It is nutrient rich, full of health benefits and very refreshing.
